block.p: * Richard Pinder was named to the new position of regional director for the Greater China and Southeast Asia operations of Leo Burnett Worldwide, Hong Kong, part of the B Com3 Group. He had been managing director at the London office of Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide, part of the WPP Group. * John Cooper was named to the vacant post of president at the Toronto office of Rapp Collins Worldwide, part of the Omnicom Group. He had been vice president for marketing, customer service, e-commerce and corporate communications at Federal Express Canada, Toronto, part of FedEx Corp.

* Matthew Harrington was named president at the New York office of Edelman Public Relations Worldwide, succeeding Thomas Buckmaster, who became vice president for communications at Honeywell Inc., Morristown, N.J. Mr. Harrington had been president for Edelman's Western region, based in San Francisco. * Kevin Roddy, associate creative director at Fallon New York, part of the Fallon Worldwide unit of Publicis, was named creative director, responsible for day-to-day management of the creative department. He assumes those duties from Jamie Barrett, who continues as executive creative director.
